item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 16, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Kyanos: eBPF-based network issue analysis tool (41 points | discuss)
2. Biological Miracle – Wood Frog (345 points | 92 comments)
3. Llama-OCR: Document to Markdown (139 points | 45 comments)

6. Tsugaru OS – A New Free FM-Towns OS (42 points | 4 comments)
7. Why did people rub snow on frozen feet? (2017) (74 points | 65 comments)
8. Non-elementary group-by aggregations in Polars vs pandas (109 points | 61 comments)
9. The Taming of the Screw (9 points | 3 comments)
10. MomBoard: E-ink display for a parent with amnesia (1889 points | 234 comments)

13. Nixie Tubes (25 points | 4 comments)
14. A basic introduction to the classfile API in Java (24 points | discuss)
15. Retrofitting spatial safety to lines of C++ (62 points | 36 comments)

17. Caltrain's electrification project is paying off (57 points | 30 comments)

23. The Practical Guide to Scaling Django (118 points | 20 comments)
24. Pex: A tool for generating .pex (Python EXecutable) files, lock files and venvs (95 points | 57 comments)
25. Seer: A GUI front end to GDB for Linux (320 points | 162 comments)
26. How public key cryptography works, using only simple math (63 points | 14 comments)
27. Show HN: Scooter – Interactive find and replace in the terminal (109 points | 53 comments)
28. C++ Template Macroprogramming versus Lisp Macros (71 points | 48 comments)
29. Go-taskflow: A taskflow-like General-purpose Task-parallel Programming Framework (61 points | 13 comments)
30. Getting Started with FPGAs (20 points | 7 comments)
